channel.title: Books on Mailund on the Internet
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Mailund on the Internet

item.title: The Coming Storm
item.description: If you are a member of Audible—and if you like audiobooks I think you should be—then they now give you two of six selected books for free every month.

item.title: Fluent Python
item.description: I just finished reading Fluent Python. This is a really nice book on Python programming. It is not an introduction to Python programming, and it is not about specific packages, such as SciPy or Scikit-learn.

item.title: New Books Page
item.description: I have set up a page for the books I have written. Nothing fancy there, it is just a list together with the cover text, but it does collect all my books on one single page.

item.title: Books
item.description: I enjoy writing and I’ve written bunch of books by now. Mostly about R programming, but also on a few other topics.
